page.title: 04THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 3
page.content: full time house wives ({50.8%}){15.7% are full time workers and{34.2%}work part time. Most of the women have non manual jobs,such as , accountants , secretaries , working with computers and book_keepers , but a few have jobs like home_helps , working on a farm , mid_day assistant and some work seasonly at the local nurseries. Men seem to like working non_manually _in offices with paper_work , rather than working as mechanics and engineers.However the difference between the two figures is not at all large. For men the most popular working place is London , followed by Colchester and several other places nearby. Only{8}work locally in Marks Tey _ probably in the local factories such as C.F Andersons and the nurseries and brickworks.{19}females work locally in Marks Tey ,
